Fri, 18 Oct 2024 02:25:25 +0000 Gisborne Judo Club cleaned up at the national championships in Rotorua, bringing home 14 titles. Back (from left) Jody Walters, Gary McKenzie, Johan Jacobs, Alex MacKay, Amelia Gibb and Aaron MacDougall. Middle: Bevan Brooking, Sarah Gibb, James McKenzie, Lucas Nicol and coach Jason King. Front: Gus MacDougall, Kees Beets, Liam Nicol, Malachi Whitley and Tanner Feisst. Absent: Mitchell Spriggs, Ella Kelso, Ivy Fenwick and John MacKay.
